whatIs.question: What is this?
whatIs.answer: Forever PTO is a tool to help you plan and optimize your paid time off (PTO) by suggesting the best dates to take off based on public holidays and your preferences. Given the complexity of holiday planning, Forever PTO aims to simplify the process and maximize your free time. Allowing you to choose different strategies to balance your time off throughout the year to maximize your time off. Allowing you to fully customize the holidays, the names of the festivities and even add custom holidays specific to your company or region.

whyNotSeeingCountry.question: Why am I not seeing my country or holidays correctly?
whyNotSeeingCountry.answer: For simplicity and performance we use a third-party tool to get the bank holidays for a given country and year. It may happen that your country or region is not supported or the data is not up to date. To fix this you can add custom holidays specific to your needs.

pricing.question: Why is there a paid model?
pricing.answer: Forever PTO is free. However, we use a paid model to support the costs of maintaining data, infrastructure and continuous improvements. The paid model funds updates, support and hosting. We also offer a free tier with core features to ensure everyone can benefit from better PTO planning. If you want to go ad free and support the project there's a volunteer donation.

algorithms.question: How does the suggestion algorithm work?
algorithms.answer: The system analyzes available workdays, holidays and user preferences (e.g. avoiding past days) to produce PTO combinations that maximize effective time off. It applies heuristics based on efficiency and scoring to prioritize bridges and grouped days.

strategies.question: What is the difference between "balanced" and "optimized" strategies?
strategies.answer: Balanced aims to spread time off across the year for steady value, while Optimized focuses on maximizing efficiency (effective days per PTO day) by prioritizing the best ratio combinations.

data.question: How do you handle my data?
data.answer: We store only the minimum information required to generate suggestions. We do not share data with third parties without consent. See the privacy policy for full details.

encryption.question: Is my data encrypted?
encryption.answer: Your vacation planning data is stored locally in your browser. We apply XOR cipher obfuscation to make the data unreadable in casual inspection. This method is designed to prevent accidental exposure, not protect against determined attackers. We don't store sensitive personal information, and you maintain full control of your data on your device. All your data (PTO days, selected dates, custom holidays, preferences) is stored exclusively in your browser's local storage. We never send this information to our servers. Your vacation planning stays completely private on your device.

tutorial.description: Start by entering your PTO details in the left sidebar: your PTO available, your country and your region. We will handle the rest for you. If you still have doubts you can click the following button to start an interactive tutorial.
tutorial.restartDescription: Want to see the interactive tutorial again? Click the button below to restart the guided tour through all the features and settings.

steps.filtersDescription: Here you can configure all your PTO preferences. Set your available PTO days, select your country and region to get accurate holidays, choose the year, and customize your optimization strategy.
steps.ptoDaysDescription: Enter the total number of PTO (Paid Time Off) days you have available for the year. This is the foundation for all calculations and suggestions.
steps.countryDescription: We infer your country from your CDN by default but can select any desired country. From this value we will fetch the official public holidays to include them in your calendar.
steps.regionDescription: Some countries have regional holidays. Select your specific region to get the most accurate holiday calendar for your area.
steps.yearDescription: Choose the year you want to plan for. Holidays and suggestions will be generated for the selected year.
steps.strategyDescription: Choose between different strategies: "Balanced" spreads your PTO evenly throughout the year, while "Optimized" maximizes efficiency by creating longer breaks with fewer PTO days.
steps.allowPastDaysDescription: Toggle this option if you want to include dates that have already passed in the current year. Useful for planning retrospectively or for next year.
steps.carryOverDescription: If your PTO days carry over into the next year, specify how many months they remain valid. This helps you plan PTO usage across year boundaries.
steps.toolsDescription: Access helpful calculators here: estimate your PTO based on work history, calculate the monetary value of unused PTO, or count workdays between dates.
steps.alternativesDescription: Navigate through different PTO suggestions generated by our AI. Compare efficiency metrics, total days off, and find the perfect balance. The first option is always our recommended suggestion, marked with a sparkle icon. Use the arrows to explore alternatives and click "Apply Alternative" to use a different suggestion.
steps.statusDescription: Monitor your PTO allocation in real-time. See auto-assigned days (suggested by AI), manually selected days, and remaining days available. You can reset manual changes anytime to return to the AI suggestion.
steps.calendarDescription: This is your year-at-a-glance calendar. Holidays appear in gray, AI-suggested PTO days in teal, and manually selected days in blue. Click any working day to manually toggle selection. The calendar updates instantly as you explore different alternatives.
steps.finishDescription: Now you know how to use Forever PTO to maximize your time off. Start by configuring your preferences in the sidebar, and let the app suggest the best PTO days for you. Enjoy your well-deserved breaks!

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.p1: This Cookie Policy explains how Forever PTO (<link>https://forever-pto.com</link>) uses cookies and similar technologies. By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.
introduction.p2: We are committed to transparency about how we collect and use data. This policy provides detailed information about the types of cookies we use, their purpose, and how you can control them.

whatAreCookies.title: What are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.p1: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.
whatAreCookies.p2: Cookies can be 'persistent' cookies or 'session' cookies. Persistent cookies remain on your device for a set period. Session cookies are temporary and are deleted when you close your browser.

strictlyNecessary.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies (Local Storage)
strictlyNecessary.description: We use browser local storage to save your preferences and application state. These are essential for the website to function and cannot be disabled:

filters.label: Filters Storage:
filters.description: Stores your selected country, region, and year preferences for holiday filtering.

holidays.label: Holidays Storage:
holidays.description: Saves your custom holidays and vacation days configuration.

location.description: Stores your selected location (country and region) for accurate holiday information.

premiumKey.description: Securely stores your premium access key when you upgrade to Premium.

calendar.description: Stores your calendar view preferences and selected dates.

duration.description: These are stored permanently in your browser's local storage until you manually clear them.

grant.description: When you accept analytics cookies, we update consent to allow analytics_storage.
